name: spreadsheetSetHeader
description: Adds a header to the specified worksheet.

params.name: spreadsheetObj
params.description: The Excel spreadsheet object to which to add the header.

params.name: leftHeader
params.description: Adds the header in the left side of the worksheet.

params.name: centerHeader
params.description: Adds the header in the center of the worksheet.

params.name: rightHeader
params.description: Adds the header in the right side of the worksheet.

examples.title: Simple spreadsheetSetHeader Example
examples.description: Here,we've example to set the header for excel file.
